heading: HR02514
0: A RESOLUTION STRONGLY CONDEMNING THE DISRUPTION OF A JOINT MEDICAL MISSION IN PATIKUL, SULU BY THE THREE MORTAR FIRES SUSPECTED TO HAVE COME FROM THE ABU SAYYAF GROUP AND URGING ALL CONCERNED AUTHORITIES TO SWIFTLY APPREHEND THE PERPETRATORS IN ORDER TO SECURE PEACE AND ORDER FOR OUR PEOPLE

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02514
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION STRONGLY CONDEMNING THE DISRUPTION OF A JOINT MEDICAL MISSION IN PATIKUL, SULU BY THE THREE MORTAR FIRES SUSPECTED TO HAVE COME FROM THE ABU SAYYAF GROUP AND URGING ALL CONCERNED AUTHORITIES TO SWIFTLY APPREHEND THE PERPETRATORS IN ORDER TO SECURE PEACE AND ORDER FOR OUR PEOPLE
